Text:

It has got mac app store layout and users can get apps directly by clicking the apps image.

-Operating system:Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit
-System Type:x86-based PC
-Processor:AMD Athlon(tm) 64 X2 Dual Core Processor 5200 +2.70Ghz,2 Core, 2 Logical Processors

-Graphic card:ATI Radeon HD 4600 Series
-Graphic memory size:1024MB
-Graphic core clock:650MHz

-So what's the problem?!Please leave a comment if anyone has solution
@Markosargo The problem is not on your system, the game is not cracked

Works great but how do you change the name from EMPTY to something else?
